thread.title: Chelsea boss Antonio Conte makes London cabbie's day with £12 tip
thread.title_full: Chelsea boss Antonio Conte makes London cabbie's day with £12 tip

author: James Whaling
title: Chelsea boss Antonio Conte makes London cabbie's day with £12 tip
text:
Sport Chelsea boss Antonio Conte makes London cabbie's day with £12 tip The starstruck cabbie took to Twitter to document his journey with the Italian who has made a huge impact in the Premier League Share Conte made the day of a London cabbie (Photo: Chelsea FC via Getty Images) Share Get Chelsea FC   
Chelsea boss Antonio Conte made the day of a London taxi driver on Monday - by giving him a £12 tip. 
The starstruck cabbie took to Twitter to document his journey with the Italian who has made a huge impact in the Premier League since his arrival at Stamford Bridge over the summer. 
Former Italy boss Conte succeeded Guus Hiddink in west London following the sacking of Jose Mourinho earlier in the season after a dismal defence of the Blues' Premier League title. 
And he has masterminded a seemingly inevitable march to a second top-flight crown in three years for the club. 
Chelsea sit 10 points clear of nearest rivals Spurs with 12 games remaining in the campaign. 
But it isn't just on the field that Conte has made an impact. 
Cabbie Jason Marco tweeted: "My day, my week, my month has just been made perfect! 
"I was totally starstruck at first then was chatting all the way. £12 tip. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
